text: This subchapter shall only apply to a covered loan as defined in § 26- 1151.01(7)(A).
historical:
Emergency Act Amendments

For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 201 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).

Legislative History of Laws

For Law 14-132, see notes following § 26-1151.01.
